file.name: openapi.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
servers:
  - url: 'https://translator.ncats.io/broad-pgm-translator'
info:
  title: Broad probabilistic graphical models translator
  termsOfService: 'https://translator.ncats.io/broad-pgm-translator'
  contact:
    name: Broad PGM translator
    url: 'https://translator.ncats.io/broad-pgm-translator/'
    email: translator@broadinstitute.org
    x-role: responsible organization
    x-id: 'https://github.com/broadinstitute/broad-translator'
  version: 0.1.0    
# tags:
## deprecate this registry entry?
#   - name: translator
paths:
  /modelList:
    get:
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  modelID:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: string
      summary: List available models
  '/{modelID}/modelSignature':
    get:
      summary: Get model signature
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  modelID:
                    type: string
                  variableGroup:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        variableGroupID:
                          type: string
                        authorityURL:
                          type: string
                        asInput:
                          type: boolean
                        asOutput:
                          type: boolean
                        groupDistribution:
                          enum:
                            - discrete
                            - empirical
                            - Gaussian
                            - Poisson
                        groupType:
                          enum:
                            - Bollean
                            - Number
                            - String
                          type: string
                        groupValue:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: string
                        modelVariable:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: object
                            properties:
                              variableID:
                                type: string
                              authorityURI:
                                type: string
                              groupDistribution:
                                enum:
                                  - discrete
                                  - empirical
                                  - Gaussian
                                  - Poisson
                              variableType:
                                enum:
                                  - Bollean
                                  - Number
                                  - String
                                type: string
                              variableValue:
                                type: array
                                items:
                                  type: string
      parameters:
        - name: modelID
          in: path
          description: Model identifier
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
  /evaluateModel:
    post:
      summary: evaluate model
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                modelID:
                  type: string
                modelInput:
                  type: array
                  items:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      variableGroupID:
                        type: string
                      modelVariable:
                        type: array
                        items:
                          type: object
                          properties:
                            variableID:
                              type: string
                            priorDistribution:
                              type: object
                              properties:
                                discreteDistribution:
                                  type: array
                                  items:
                                    type: object
                                    properties:
                                      variableValue:
                                        type: string
                                      priorProbability:
                                        type: number
                                GaussianDistribution:
                                  type: object
                                  properties:
                                    distributionMean:
                                      type: number
                                    distributionStDev:
                                      type: number
                                PoissonDistribution:
                                  type: object
                                  properties:
                                    lambdaParameter:
                                      type: number
                                empiricalDistribution:
                                  type: object
                                  properties:
                                    distributionMean:
                                      type: number
                                    distributionStDev:
                                      type: number
                                    distributionPercentile:
                                      type: array
                                      items:
                                        type: number
                modelOutput:
                  type: array
                  items:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      variableGroupID:
                        type: string
                      variableID:
                        type: array
                        items:
                          type: string
                      rawOutput:
                        type: boolean
        required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  posteriorProbabilities:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        variableGroupID:
                          type: string
                        modelVariable:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: object
                            properties:
                              variableID:
                                type: string
                              posteriorDistribution:
                                type: object
                                properties:
                                  discreteDistribution:
                                    type: array
                                    items:
                                      type: object
                                      properties:
                                        variableValue:
                                          type: string
                                        posteriorProbability:
                                          type: number
                                  GaussianDistribution:
                                    type: object
                                    properties:
                                      distributionMean:
                                        type: number
                                      distributionStDev:
                                        type: number
                                  PoissonDistribution:
                                    type: object
                                    properties:
                                      lambdaParameter:
                                        type: number
                                  empiricalDistribution:
                                    type: object
                                    properties:
                                      distributionMean:
                                        type: number
                                      distributionStDev:
                                        type: number
                                      distributionPercentile:
                                        type: array
                                        items:
                                          type: number
                                  rawDistribution:
                                    type: array
                                    items:
                                      type: number

components:
  schemas: {}
